ayas.text: nazala bika wa anta khayru manzūlin bih
ayas.bismillah: allāhumma inna hādhā `abduka wabnu `abdika wabnu amatik

ayas.text: allāhumma inna lā na`lamu minhu illā khayrā
allāhumma in kāna muḥsinan fazidfī iḥsānih
wa in kāna musī-an wa mudhnibā
waḥshur-hu ma`an nabiyyi wal a-immatiṭ ṭayyibīnaṭ ṭāhirīn
